schedule.description: The Discord channel ID of the schedule channel for this template

events.description: The Discord channel ID of the events channel for this template

introduction.description: The Discord channel ID of the introductions channel for this template

general.description: The Discord channel ID of the general (normal chat) channel for this template

forum.description: The Discord channel ID of the forum channel for this template

default_timezone.description: The default timezone to use for this template in IANA (Region/Zone) format.

use_all_events.description: Whether this schedule encompasses all the event lanes or not.

abbreviation.description: How this language is abbreviated e.g. ASL

native_localization.description: The ISO code of the language considered the 'native written language' associated with this template, e.g. en

channel.description: The key in the 'channels' object that this corresponds to.

url.description: The name of the environment variable containing the webhook URL to use.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to update.

header.description: Content to appear in the 'header embed' if applicable
